metadata.title: CVE-2023-4582 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description: Due to large allocation checks in Angle for glsl shaders being too lenienta buffer overflow could have occured when allocating too much privateshader memory on mac OS. *This bug only affects Firefox on macOS. Otheroperating systems are unaffected.* This vulnerability affects Firefox <117, Firefox ESR < 115.2, and Thunderbird < 115.2.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
